elements.description:
### Usage
    This is a helper component to support display of button on hover effect in px-tile and avoid duplicate code
    
    <px-title-button title-action-button="{{titleActionButton}}"></px-title-button>
    
    Where titleActionButton is a JSON object such as: 
    let titleActionButton = {"key":"1","val":"Favorite","icon":"px-nav:favorite", "selected": true, "color": "orange"};
    See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design

properties.name: titleActionButton
properties.description:
Single action button to display on the title section right side.
See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design for more details.

methods.name: _handleSelection
methods.description: Fires px-title-on-action-clicked with selection detail. E.g. {key: "1", val: "Favorite", selected: true}

attributes.name: title-action-button
attributes.description:
Single action button to display on the title section right side.
See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design for more details.

elements.description:
### Usage
    This is a helper component to support display of button on hover effect in px-tile and avoid duplicate code
    
    <px-action-buttons action-buttons="{{actionButtons}}"></px-action-buttons>
    
    If items <= 3 it will display the elements one after the other
    If items > 3 it will display the list of elements in a dropdown
    
    actionButtons is a JSON object such as: 
    E.g. for items = 3
    let titleActionButton = {"items":[{"key":"1","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:phone"},{"key":"2","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"key":"3","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:edit"}]};
    E.g for items > 3
    let titleActionButton = {"items":[{"key":"1","val":"Edit","icon":"px-utl:edit","selected":true},{"key":"2","val":"Copy","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"key":"3","val":"Remove","icon":"px-vis:trash-series"},{"key":"4","val":"Notification","icon":"px-nav:notification"}],"sortMode":"key","buttonStyle":"icon","icon":"px-nav:more","displayValue":"Select","disabled":false,"disableClear":false,"hideChevron":true,"multi":false,"searchMode":false}
    
    See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design for button options 
    See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown for dropdown options

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description:
Action buttons to display below the description/copy text.
Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Call _unlisten() to detach event listeners for action buttons.

methods.name: _unlisten
methods.description: Detach event listeners for action buttons.

methods.name: _actionButtonsChanged
methods.description:
Observer when actionButtons changes.  
Sets flag _isDropdown true if actionButtons size is greater than 3, false otherwise.
If _isDropdown === true it will update px-dropdown options menu

methods.name: _onSelected
methods.description: Callback for on-tap event for action items when the list size is 3 or less

methods.name: _itemSelected
methods.description: Callback for selected/unselected action title dropdown items when the list is greater than 3

methods.name: _handleSelection
methods.description: Fires px-title-action with selection detail. E.g. {key: "1", val: "Favorite", selected: true}

attributes.name: action-buttons
attributes.description:
Action buttons to display below the description/copy text.
Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

elements.description:
### Usage
Footer Content Here
 For title-action-button see https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design ### Styling The following custom properties are also available for styling: Custom property | Description | Default :----------------|:-------------|:---------- `--px-tile-width` | Width of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-height` | Height of the whole tile | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-width` | Width of the thumbnail portion | `20rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-height` | Height of the thumbnail portion | `11.66667rem` `--px-tile-thumbnail-background-color` | Background color of the thumbnail portion | `white` `--px-tile-background-color` | Background color of the tile | `lightgray` `--px-tile-text-background-color` | Background color of the the bottom bar of the tile | `lightgray` `--px-tile-title-color` | Text color for title in the bottom bar | `darkslategray` `--px-tile-subtitle-color` | Text color for subtitle in the bottom bar | `gray` `--px-tile-text-color` | Text color for the description text in the bottom bar | `darkslategray` `--px-tile-overlay-desc-text-height` | Height of overlay description text | `9.1rem` `--px-tile-overlay-background-color` | Background color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `black` `--px-tile-overlay-text-color` | Text color for the overlay of a hoverable tile | `white`

properties.name: hoverable
properties.description:
If true, hovering over the card will cause an overlay to appear
with more detailed information, including the description
and an optional slot for showing a footer at the bottom.

properties.name: _hovered
properties.description: Whether the tile is currently being hovered.

properties.name: title
properties.description: Main text label for the tile.

properties.name: description
properties.description:
Description information to be displayed underneath tile and subtitle.
Default : Only the first ~3 lines of text will be displayed, after which it will be truncated.
You can customize this using by adjusting `--px-tile-desc-text-height` SASS variable. (e.g. 1 line = 1 rem,
to set to 5 lines truncated, set --px-tile-desc-text-height : 5rem)

properties.name: overlayDescription
properties.description:
Description information to be displayed in the overlay of a hoverable card.
It has more space to display text content and can be adjusted along side with
total height of the tile

properties.name: titleActionButton
properties.description:
Single action button to display on the title section right side. 
See https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design

properties.name: actionButtons
properties.description:
Action buttons to display below the description text.

If items <= 3 it will display the buttons/text inline.

Please refer to px-buttons-design (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-buttons-design) for a list of supported properties

If items > 3 it will display the list of elements in a dropdown.

Please refer to px-dropdown (https://github.com/PredixDev/px-dropdown) for a list of supported properties

Example when items = 3:

{"items":[{"key":"1","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:phone"},{"key":"2","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"key":"3","type":"btn--bare btn--icon","icon":"px-utl:edit"}]}

Example when items > 3:

{"items":[{"key":"1","val":"Edit","icon":"px-utl:edit","selected":true},{"key":"2","val":"Copy","icon":"px-utl:copy"},{"key":"3","val":"Remove","icon":"px-vis:trash-series"},{"key":"4","val":"Notification","icon":"px-nav:notification"}],"sortMode":"key","buttonStyle":"icon","icon":"px-nav:more","displayValue":"Select","disabled":false,"disableClear":false,"hideChevron":true,"multi":false,"searchMode":false}

Event fired on item selection:

`px-title-on-action-clicked`

methods.name: _hover
methods.description: Method used internally for flipping the hovered status of a tile.

methods.name: _hoverableChanged
methods.description: On change callback to remove overlay

methods.name: attached
methods.description: Attach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: detached
methods.description: Detach event listeners for hoverable tiles.

methods.name: _getClass
methods.description: Returns class to control overlay for hoverable tiles.
